Package game

Class Collectible

java.lang.Object
city.cs.engine.Body
city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
game.Collectible
Direct Known Subclasses:
Armour, Bullets, Gun, HealthPotion
public abstract class Collectible extends city.cs.engine.DynamicBody
Represents a generic collectible item within the game.

This abstract class serves as a base for various types of collectibles in the game. It extends DynamicBody, allowing it to participate in the physics world with custom properties. Each collectible is associated with an image and can be scaled according to its intended visual size. Collectibles have no gravity effect applied to them by default, making them static in the air or on the ground until interacted with.

Since:
1.0

  • Constructor Details

    • Collectible

      public Collectible(city.cs.engine.World world, city.cs.engine.Shape shape, String imagePath, float scale)
      Constructs a new collectible object within the specified game world.

      This constructor initializes the collectible with a specific shape and image. The image is scaled to fit the visual representation of the collectible. The collectible is also set to have no effect from gravity.

      Parameters:
      world - The game world where this collectible exists.
      shape - The physical shape of the collectible for collision detection.
      imagePath - The path to the image file for the visual representation of the collectible.
      scale - The scale factor for resizing the image relative to its original size.
